WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
I have created couple of packages like Google Chrome, Skype..
Among those chrome went fine and got installed on all the machines. But clients unable to get the skype update. i have followed same steps for both the packages.. i dont know whats wrong with it, status showing unknown.
Is anyone tried skype pakage?
Please help me.

Comments.Message:
You can try to activate Windows Update Client Debug log with this .Reg

```
Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\WindowsUpdate\Trace]
"Flags"=dword:00000016
"LogFile"="WindowsUpdate.log"
"Level"=dword:00000004
 [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\WindowsUpdate\Trace\Datastore]
"Flags"=dword:00000016
"Level"=dword:00000003
```

And see which rule doesn't match
